quote: To transform Capalonga into a progressive, sustainable, and resilient municipality where every citizen enjoys quality life, equal opportunities, and participates actively in governance while preserving our natural heritage and cultural identity.
author: Hon. Roberto C. Santos

quote: To provide efficient, transparent, and responsive public service through innovative programs, sustainable development initiatives, and inclusive governance that empowers communities and promotes social justice for all residents of Capalonga.
author: Hon. Maria Elena D. Cruz

quote: We are committed to integrity, accountability, and excellence in public service. We believe in participatory governance, environmental stewardship, and the promotion of peace and order for the welfare of our constituents.
author: Hon. Jose P. Reyes

quote: Our development strategy focuses on sustainable agriculture, eco-tourism, infrastructure improvement, education advancement, and healthcare enhancement to create a balanced and prosperous community for present and future generations.
author: Hon. Ana Marie L. Garcia

quote: We pledge to serve with dedication, compassion, and unwavering commitment to the welfare of our people. Every decision we make is guided by the principles of good governance and the pursuit of the common good.
author: Hon. Carlos M. Mendoza
